'''Expired baked potato brick stairs''' are an [[expired baked potato brick]] variant of the [[stairs]], added in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
{{breaking row|Expired Baked Potato Brick Stairs|Hoe|Wood|horizontal=1|hidecopper=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Expired baked potato brick stairs generate naturally in [[colesseum]]s and [[ruined portatol]]s.
